definitions.definition: A cask of a certain size; its volume used as a measure of capacity for liquids , containing 63 wine gallons , or about 52 + ⁄ 2 imperial gallons (a half pipe ).
A large barrel or cask of indefinite contents , especially one containing from 100 to 140 gallons.

main_definition: ( British ) A cask of a certain size; its volume used as a measure of capacity for liquids , containing 63 wine gallons , or about 52 + ⁄ 2 imperial gallons (a half pipe ).
secondary_definitions: A large barrel or cask of indefinite contents , especially one containing from 100 to 140 gallons.
